It is a fun game with some challenging parts.
Игра имеет при себе интересный сюжет, персонажей и множество комнат-головоломок. А мультиплейер один из самых интересных из тез во что я играл

pretty enjoyable if you have patience friend and this game teach me to be patience and force me to use my BIG BRAIN so basically: YES
i recommend it if you want to  improve (actually kinda look like destroying) your BIG BRAIN

好好好，剧情新颖，就是什么时候出3

Just like the first but more complex and much more fun and engaging + now with CO-OP!

do play!

Вот и прошёл я вторую часть и мне очень понравилось!Опять же,порталы - это круто!А тут идея развита куда больше благодаря улучшенному движку нежели в первой части,сюжет стать просто великолепным!Есть и драма и комедия и нежданные повороты,а это сами знаете очень круто!Я ещё нигде не видел такой физики разрушения объектов,может они конечно заскриптованы,но выглядят потрясающе и это только 2012 год!Что было бы если Valve и дальше активно развивали движок неизвестно,но думаю Half live Alyx это показал!Одним словом - рекомендую! owo

Cave Johnson here! For this next test, we put nanoparticles in the gel. In layman's terms, that's a billion little gizmos that are gonna travel into your bloodstream and pump experimental genes and RNA molecules and so forth into your tumors. Now, maybe you don't have any tumors. Well, don't worry. If you sat on a folding chair in the lobby and weren't wearing lead underpants, we took care of that too!
Anyway, BUY THIS GAME, and Black Mesa can eat my bankrupt--

"[gentle laughter] It's been fun. Don't come back"
başyapıt
10 years later, still playing this game. When is the move coming out? When is Portal 3 being released?
tres bon jeu, solo immersif, coop tres fun, je recommande
On retrouve le bon humour du 1er et toujours de bon "test" ! De quoi bien profiter de son temps de jeu !
老折磨王了，一边晕一边玩，继续玩继续晕。
This game made me realize that my friend is incredibly stupid!
its the best rated game on steam for a REASON
Game runs very smoothly and I think the puzzles are great. This is an improvement to the first Portal. Very fun game.
Just one of those games you HAVE to play on pc.
good game one the best should buy

Советую всем. Я её перепрошёл несколько раз не считая того что я в неё играл на пиратке и на личензии оч много раз прошёл. В мультиплеере ПОЧТИ всё прошёл. Так что имейте друзей у которых она тоже есть в двоём играть веселее
Great game but needs some brain to play
Fun and interactive gameplay, hilarious story with great characters, and with challenging puzzles for what more you can ask?
Great Classic, In-depth world building, and great characters
Una joya de Valve. Muy buen juego y muy divertido
Not really anything i dislike about the game, its just the best, my favorite game from valve and one of m all time favorites.
感谢组织给我这个人工智障出厂的机会
omg i finished it super fun game totally reccomend
This game made me hate the talking turrets.
This game has a really good story and has community maps.  Would recommend.

La secuela perfecta.
Continua la historia de una manera genial, agregando nuevos elementos tanto argumentales como en la jugabilidad, y si te terminas la campaña, tenes el Cooperativo y los cientos de mapas de la comunidad.

De los mejores juegos de la historia,
One of the greatest games of all time.

I've had this game for years now, played through story mode twice, and coop twice with different friends. It still is one of my favorite puzzle games of all time. Recently I'vfe started toying around with PTI puzzle maker, and it is really fun to mess around with. Overall, this is a great game, and to me, it's a classic. I'm sure that anyone who enjoys puzzles and comedy, will have a blast playing this, since it also has some of the best lines in gaming history, in my opinion.
10/10 there is no sutch thing as a perfect game but this too me is a perfect sequel, i was a bit late too the portal party but this was really fun
portal is like your mum big sexy and hard

Сюжет интересный и не лишён юмора, на нём он и основан. Озвучка в оригинале просто божественна, Гладос  смакует каждую издёвку над Челл. Уитли тоже очень интересный и смешной. (Спасибо актёрам русской озвучки!) Игра очень интересная, и местами, сложная. Обязательна к прохождению! Автор этого поста - Чудовище
Amazing gameplay, mechanics, story. Simply one of the best games I've ever played, totally recommended.
o jogo é muito bom, mas não se esqueça de jogar o primeiro antes de jogar esse

indirimdeyken (1.80₺) arkadaşımla aldık ve beraber oynuyoruz. İkimizinde ortak fikri hayatımızda harcadığımız en iyi 1 lira 80 kuruş un bu oyun olduğu yönünde. Oyun hem eğlendiriyor hem de bir yandan insanı düşünmeye itekliyor.
Uzun lafın kısası yanınızda sizle oynayabilecek bir arkadaşınız varsa şiddetle tavsiye ederim.
great logical and sweet game overall, doesnt seem like that but the humour and overall experience was just a fun ride. Would recommend and surely will play again.

Love this game! I'm on my third singleplayer play-through right now, and each time the game is just as ejoyable. Characters are lovable, and the additions to the lore are perfectly done! A really fair price for the quality and replay value you get :)
